messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by Maxim Savin. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.

messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to space being cold, a swarm of squeaking things have stampeded into the maintenance tunnels.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Vote for the codes

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: you are not getting the codes

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by Maxim Savin. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: one more request sent will result in severe punishment

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: No

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: your captain has proven incompetent you are all within reason to start a mutiny

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Electrical Maintenance.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Dormitory Toilets.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Gravity Generator Room.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Ion storm detected near the station. Please check all AI-controlled equipment for errors.
